text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi U just refuse to get contract tracing in regards to the coronavirus don’t u or u just don’t give a damn. Let’s try & put it in layman terms. If you have coronavirus but NO symptoms, u can still pass it to others. That’s the main reason EVERY1 should be tested
